Text: Many thanks for this. Well appreciated.

Can't moan about free stuff, and I've always enjoyed this torrent! But is it not possible to label the album the same on each track to that they stay in a set album on my iPhone?
I think everyone would love this idea!

Thanks!

@TompsonLocal
u can easily sort ur prob with itunes by after adding all songs to ur library change to a list vew & highlight all the top 40 singles then right click & goto get info & change the Album Artist to VA & click ok. Change back to album cover view or what ever u use n they will all be in one folder.
oh n many many thanks @oldskoolscouse for your continual perfect uploads xx
